name: Depot Demolition
description:
This is a short sandbox-type game that I decided to export while learning the unreal engine.

It's a physics-based game where you can destroy a depot by launching projectile balls.

CONTROLS:

W A S D = MOVEMENT

SPACE = SHOOT PROJECTILE

R = RELOAD LEVEL

ESC = QUIT GAME

It is borderline unplayable but maybe can be some fun for messing around!

I hope some of you can enjoy it!
